tune.name: The Three Maestros in the Partyroom
tune.author: Mikael Georgii
tune.content:
\relative f'' <<
  \new Voice {
    \clef treble
    \time 4/4
    \key g \minor

    \repeat volta 2 {
      \partial 4 d4 |
      g,8 a bes c d4 g,8 a |
      bes8 c d4 g,8 a bes d |
      ees8 aes, c ees aes c, ees aes |
      a8 g fis ees d c bes a |
      \break

      g8 a bes c d4 g,8 a |
      bes8 c d4 g,8 a bes d |
      ees8 aes, c ees aes c, ees aes |
      fis8 d c a g4
    } \break

    \repeat volta 2 {
      d'8 c |
      bes8 c bes a g4 g8 a |
      bes8 c d c bes a g bes |
      a8 bes a g f4 f8 g |
      a8 f a c f c a f |
      \break

      bes8 c bes a g4 g8 a |
      bes8 g bes d g f ees d |
      fis8 ees d c bes a g f |
      g4 g g
    }
  }

  \new ChordNames {
    \chordmode {
      d4:7 |
      g2:m g:m/d | g:m bes:m/d | aes aes/c | d d:7/fis |
      g2:m g:m/d | g:m g:m/bes | aes aes/c | d:7 g4:m

      s4 |
      g2:m g:m/d | g:m c:7 | f f/a | f f/a |
      g2:m g:m/d | g:m g:m/bes | d:7/a d:7 | g2.:m
    }
  }
>>
